plot: Putting everyday people on the spot by asking them questions they should know the answers to, but often don't. The show's questions vary by subject. The show is produced to be both entertaining and educational.
plot_en: Putting everyday people on the spot by asking them questions they should know the answers to, but often don't. The show's questions vary by subject. The show is produced to be both entertaining and educational.
plot_es: Putting everyday people on the spot by asking them questions they should know the answers to, but often don't. The show's questions vary by subject. The show is produced to be both entertaining and educational.
title: On the Spot
